entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle later in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
